timings.name: Maximum Historical Biopsy to First Dose

conditions.name: Pro-C3 Eligibility Threshold
conditions.description: Fibrogenic activity marker threshold for eligibility
conditions.text: Pro-C3 ≥12.6 ng/mL at Week -8 (SV1)

conditions.name: ELF Score Eligibility Threshold
conditions.description: Enhanced Liver Fibrosis score threshold for eligibility
conditions.text: ELF score ≥7.7 at Week -8 (SV1)

conditions.name: NASH Histological Criteria
conditions.text: NAS ≥3 with at least 1 point in lobular inflammation

conditions.name: Fibrosis Stage Eligibility
conditions.text: Liver fibrosis stage F1 through F4cc according to NASH CRN

conditions.name: F4cc Fibrosis Criteria
conditions.description: Non-invasive criteria for F4 compensated cirrhosis
conditions.text: FIB-4 ≥3.48 and LSM ≥20 kPa or Agile 4 score ≥0.57

conditions.name: AST Exclusion Threshold
conditions.text: AST levels >5×ULN

conditions.name: ALT Exclusion Threshold
conditions.text: ALT levels >5×ULN

conditions.name: ALP Exclusion Threshold
conditions.text: ALP ≥2×ULN

conditions.name: Serum Creatinine Exclusion
conditions.text: Serum creatinine ≥1.5×ULN or eGFR <45 mL/min/1.73 m2

conditions.name: INR Exclusion Threshold
conditions.text: INR ≥1.3 (except for participants receiving anticoagulant treatment)

conditions.name: Total Bilirubin Exclusion
conditions.text: TBL ≥ULN (except for Gilbert's syndrome with normal direct bilirubin)

conditions.name: Direct Bilirubin Exclusion
conditions.text: Direct bilirubin ≥3×ULN

conditions.name: Platelet Count Exclusion
conditions.text: Platelet count <60×10^9/L

conditions.name: Decompensated Liver Disease
conditions.text: Presence or history of ascites, hepatic encephalopathy, or variceal bleeding

conditions.name: Child-Pugh Score Exclusion
conditions.text: Child-Pugh >6 (Class B or C), unless due to therapeutic anticoagulation

conditions.name: MELD Score Exclusion
conditions.text: MELD score >12

conditions.name: F4cc Safety Clearance
conditions.text: Safety and tolerability established in first four noncirrhotic (F1-F3) participants who have received at least 3 doses of ontamalimab 75 mg and have been monitored for at least 12 weeks after the first dose

conditions.name: F1 Enrollment Cap
conditions.text: Not more than four participants with F1 fibrosis will be enrolled

conditions.name: Age Eligibility
conditions.text: Aged 18 to 70 years, inclusive

conditions.name: Clinically Concerning Liver Chemistry
conditions.description: Investigator discretion for elevated liver enzymes
conditions.text: AST or ALT >4×ULN may be clinically concerning and requires investigator consultation with sponsor

conditions.name: Positive IGRA Management
conditions.description: Criteria for managing indeterminate IGRA results
conditions.text: If both initial and confirmatory IGRA results are indeterminate, participant may be enrolled after negative Mantoux tuberculin skin test and consultation with specialist determining low risk of infection

transitionRules.name: Screening to Liver Biopsy Transition
transitionRules.text: Participants with Pro-C3 ≥12.6 ng/mL and ELF score ≥7.7 who meet inclusion criteria and none of exclusion criteria at SV1 will be eligible for liver biopsy at SV2

transitionRules.name: Screening to Treatment Transition
transitionRules.text: Indication for NASH (NAS ≥3 with at least 1 point in lobular inflammation) and liver fibrosis stage F1 through F4cc in the liver biopsy will enable participants to enroll in the study

transitionRules.name: F4cc Enrollment Gate
transitionRules.text: After safety and tolerability have been established in the first four noncirrhotic (F1-F3) participants who have received at least 3 doses of ontamalimab 75 mg and have been monitored for at least 12 weeks after the first dose, eligible F4cc participants will be allowed to enroll

transitionRules.name: Treatment to Follow-up Transition
transitionRules.text: All participants, including those who discontinue, will undergo a safety follow-up period through 12 weeks after the last dose of study drug

transitionRules.name: Liver Chemistry Stopping Rule
transitionRules.text: Liver chemistry stopping criteria per algorithm for study drug discontinuation

transitionRules.name: PML Symptom Discontinuation
transitionRules.text: Any unexplained symptoms suggestive of progressive multifocal leukoencephalopathy (PML) based on targeted neurological assessment

transitionRules.name: SARS-CoV-2 Screening Pause
transitionRules.text: In case of positive test for SARS-CoV-2 infection, screening may be paused for an additional 2 weeks

transitionRules.name: Screen Failure to Rescreen
transitionRules.text: An individual who has been designated a screen failure may be rescreened once

transitionRules.name: Decompensation Discontinuation
transitionRules.text: New signs of decompensation and/or clinically meaningful change in disease status including presence of ascites, hepatic encephalopathy, or variceal bleeding

scheduleTimelineExits.name: Study Completion
scheduleTimelineExits.description: Completion of all protocol-required visits through Week 36 (end of follow-up period)

scheduleTimelineExits.name: Early Termination - Participant Request
scheduleTimelineExits.description: Participant may discontinue for any reason

scheduleTimelineExits.name: Early Termination - Safety
scheduleTimelineExits.description: Discontinuation due to adverse events or safety concerns including liver chemistry stopping criteria

scheduleTimelineExits.name: Early Termination - PML Suspicion
scheduleTimelineExits.description: Discontinuation due to unexplained symptoms suggestive of progressive multifocal leukoencephalopathy

scheduleTimelineExits.name: Screen Failure
scheduleTimelineExits.description: Participant does not meet eligibility criteria during screening period

scheduleTimelineExits.name: Protocol Deviation Exit
scheduleTimelineExits.description: Investigator concern for participant's compliance with protocol procedures

scheduleTimelineExits.name: Decompensation Exit
scheduleTimelineExits.description: Development of decompensated liver disease during study participation

scheduledDecisionInstances.name: Liver Biopsy Eligibility Decision
scheduledDecisionInstances.description: Decision point at SV1 to determine eligibility for liver biopsy at SV2 based on Pro-C3 and ELF thresholds

scheduledDecisionInstances.name: Enrollment Eligibility Decision
scheduledDecisionInstances.description: Decision point after liver biopsy to determine enrollment eligibility based on NASH histology and fibrosis stage

scheduledDecisionInstances.name: F4cc Enrollment Gate Decision
scheduledDecisionInstances.description: Decision point to allow F4cc participant enrollment after safety established in first four F1-F3 participants

scheduledDecisionInstances.name: Week 12 Safety Assessment
scheduledDecisionInstances.description: Safety assessment including FibroScan and liver chemistry evaluation

scheduledDecisionInstances.name: Week 24 Treatment Completion Assessment
scheduledDecisionInstances.description: End of treatment assessment including liver biopsy, cT1 MRI, FibroScan, and HepQuant-SHUNT DSI

scheduledDecisionInstances.name: Liver Chemistry Stopping Decision
scheduledDecisionInstances.description: Ongoing decision point for liver chemistry stopping criteria evaluation per algorithm

scheduledDecisionInstances.name: IGRA Result Management Decision
scheduledDecisionInstances.description: Decision point for managing indeterminate IGRA results with potential specialist consultation
